Generation IV.Diamond: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.
Generation IV.Pearl: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.
Generation IV.Platinum: Its body is made of rugged steel. However, it is partially melted in spots because of its own heat.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.
